title: The Writer's Almanac for Wednesday, February 9, 2022
description: Today is the birthday of Alice Walker (1944), author of “The Color Purple.”  Her memoir “Gathering Blossums Under Fire: The Journals of Alice Walker, 1965-2000,” will be published this spring.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of Alice Walker (1944), author of “The Color Purple.”  Her memoir “Gathering Blossums Under Fire: The Journals of Alice Walker, 1965-2000,” will be published this spring.
